features.name: Execution Details
features.description: Enhanced grep and glob tool visibility

releaseHighlight: Security improvements and critical bug fixes for better CLI stability
sourceContent:
Kiro CLI version 1.23.1 patch release (Dec 23, 2025).

## Changes
- Added execution details for grep and glob tools
- Made subagent tool in default agent not trusted by default

## Bug Fixes
- Fixed planning agent write access issues
- Fixed command parameters handling
- Fixed MCP server initialization
- Fixed tool name parsing
